programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Bistro classics, such as steak au poivre and crème brûlée, offer a taste of real French cooking without pretension. We show you how to create these dishes without spending all day in the kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make the perfect steakhouse dinner—salad with creamy blue cheese dressing and seared filet mignon.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We show you how to prepare fried rice and kung pao shrimp. Our findings of rice cookers and long-grain white rice guarantee perfect rice every time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple yet interesting, both chicken Milanese and chicken piccata are reliable test kitchen favorites. We like to start them on the stovetop but finish the cooking in the oven

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen provides foolproof recipes for two classic pasta sauces: puttanesca and Bolognese.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta with garlic and oil is perhaps the most famous quick pasta dish. It starts with ingredients on hand—garlic, good olive oil, hot red pepper flakes—and turns them into something special and uncommonly good.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We uncover the secrets to beef Burgundy at its best—and also show you a way to make portions of it ahead of time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We traveled to chili country, cooked with various experts in their kitchens, and tried out dozens of recipes in the test kitchen. We wanted a chili that would be hearty, heavy on the meat, and spicy but not overwhelmingly hot.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Macaroni and cheese and turkey Tetrazzini are two classic casseroles, but they are rarely as good as they could be. We knew we could do better—much better—in the test kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork chops are leaner than they used to be, which poses new problems for home cooks. We explain which chops to buy and how to cook them, ensuring perfectly cooked meat that is both crispy and juicy.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, life doesn't get much better than a big, juicy, smoky slab of spicy, mouth-watering ribs. Our goal was to produce flavorful, juicy, tender ribs that would be well worth the time, money, and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We were intrigued with the notion of barbecuing a whole side of salmon. Our goal was to have this large piece of fish spend enough time over the coals to pick up some real wood flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We move the turkey out of the oven and onto the grill, freeing up precious cooking space for other Thanksgiving dishes and giving us a better tasting bird. We also perfect the flavor and texture of sweet potatoes and cranberry sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef tenderloin can cost a small fortune, but it is one of the quickest and easiest large cuts to serve to a crowd. The key is to get good color development on the exterior without overcooking the interior.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Ham dinner—with green bean casserole—is classic American fare. But which kind of ham should you buy? And can you really make a "good" green bean casserole? We show you how.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our sour cream coffee cake and light, flavorful fruit salads transform weekend brunch into an indulgent meal you'll want to make even when company isn't coming over. A few tips on great coffee round out the perfect start to a day.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The appeal of such quick bread as cinnamon buns and banana bread is clear. Supermarket cinnamon buns often have an odd, artificial flavor and sponge-like texture. And banana bread doesn't need to taste like over-the-hill bananas.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Real country bread, the kind made by an artisan and never found at the supermarket, is a thing of beauty. We wanted to develop a recipe that was every bit as good as the best country loaves but that was still doable for the cook who bakes in a home oven.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thick, chewy chocolate cookies and spiced molasses cookies are classics. Watch as we discover which types of chocolate and molasses make these favorites great again.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Lemon meringue pie is a three-part recipe—crust, lemon filling, and meringue—and each one can be a challenge. We discover which rolling pins are best and whether you can use store-bought pie crust in a pinch. Then we perfect the filling and meringue.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more American than strawberry shortcake? But sometimes this classic summer fare can go terribly wrong. When it comes to cherry cobbler, sour cherries are a must. But where do you get sour cherries? Are jarred cherries a worthy alternative?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Who can resist a chocolate cake? We wanted cakes that would be great tasting and easy to prepare, and we came up with two: old-fashioned, moist, and homey; the other elegant, dense, and ethereal.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A true New York-style cheesecake should be pure and minimalist but also have just the right color, flavor, and density. With a crisp graham cracker crust and a filling that fades from creamy to cake-like, our cheesecake is worthy of any diner in New York.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to create flavorful, fresh-tasting versions of Greek and spinach salads.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's the best way to enjoy summer tomatoes? While it's hard to argue with sliced, salted tomatoes, there are times when you want to use tomatoes in more elaborate dishes, and gazpacho and a cheesy tart are two of our favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Chili is probably America's favorite one-pot supper and we wanted to create a great, simple version. And while no one thinks of a clambake as a one-pot wonder, we set out to make an indoor version simple enough to prepare even on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We go to the test kitchen to show how to make the perfect clam chowder and delicious crab cakes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Juego de niños
programme.desc: El trabajo diurno de un marine muerto en un laboratorio de ideas del gobierno lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a la vida de un niño prodigio de 12 años que puede ser el próximo objetivo del asesino.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Reglas no escritas
programme.desc: Cuando un robo a mano armada termina con la muerte de un oficial, Frank busca justicia. Pero las tensiones aumentan en la casa de los Reagan cuando Erin retira los cargos al sospechoso por falta de evidencia.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La ciudad que nunca duerme
programme.desc: Cuando el famoso actor Russell Berke, quien siguió a Danny para investigar su próximo papel, es apuñalado, Danny lo ayuda, pero debe mantener el crimen en secreto debido al estatus de celebridad de Russell.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Proteger y servir
programme.desc: Danny negocia con un hombre que mantiene a Erin como rehén en la corte. Mientras, Frank decide el castigo para Jamie, quien desobedeció órdenes y fue suspendido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se dirige a Wichita en busca de un sospechoso que secuestra niños mientras sus padres duermen. Además, Morgan está intentando averiguar quién fue el responsable del ataque.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando un sujeto ataca a la UAC, el equipo entra en acción para averiguar quién es el responsable.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fin del juego
programme.desc: Con la ayuda del equipo, Vance se enfrenta a sus demonios mientras descubre una compleja relación con un asesino que pone en peligro a toda su familia.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Apagón
programme.desc: El equipo se encuentra literalmente a oscuras cuando la investigación sobre la muerte de un teniente se relaciona con un apagón en toda la ciudad.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Juego de niños
programme.desc: El trabajo diurno de un marine muerto en un laboratorio de ideas del gobierno lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a la vida de un niño prodigio de 12 años que puede ser el próximo objetivo del asesino.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: Al caer la tarde
programme.desc: Un hombre de origen humilde enriquecido a traves del trabajo duro, corteja a la hija de un terrateniente arruinado. Él le propone casamiento y así recuperar su posición económica y social, pero ella lo rechaza.

programme.title: Alazán y enamorado
programme.desc: Un ranchero con temple debe lidiar con que su caballo se ha enamorado de Lady Godiva, la yegua de su vecina, una mujer fuerte y decidida. Mientras buscan una solución para el romance de sus caballos, entre ellos también surgirá el amor.

programme.title: Amor a ritmo de go go
programme.desc: Dos muchachos llegan a la gran ciudad con la intención de conquistarla. En una discoteca Go-Go conocen a Lupe y ahí comienza la acción y la clásica música de Rock & Roll.

programme.title: Aquí Está Tu Enamorado

programme.title: Destrucción
programme.desc: Una detective de policía reconecta con gente relacionada con una misión encubierta de hace años para encontrar paz.

programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't

programme.desc: Spencer Tracy and Fredric March go toe-to-toe in this powerful recreation of a titanic courtroom battle in which an attorney faces off against a fundamentalist in a Tennessee town where a teacher has been brought to trial for teaching Darwinism.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented women converge on AT&T Stadium to start the hardest audition process in professional sports, trying out for a coveted spot on the most famous NFL cheerleading squad in the world, the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the field narrowed down to 119 women, the pressure is on. They must quickly learn a power pom routine and the famous kickline in order to perform it an hour later before the judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The veterans finally enter the audition process. Now all 83 women are judged head to head during a panel interview, a solo dance performance and on their appearance on the football field as seen and the big screen.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: 44 women begin the very first training camp at the new 1 billion dollar Cowboys' facility, The Star. At the First Meeting, Kelli lays down the law and makes it clear that eight women will be sent home this summer.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: First, the ladies need to have the "classic look" of a Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader. Kelli's hair and make-up transformations are legendary. The ladies are also assessed through a new state of the art fitness test, "Styku".

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli media trains the rookie candidates to determine who best represents the DCC at press events. NBC news anchor, Meredith Land tests their on-camera interview skills.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Personality is critical when representing the DCC brand. Kelli takes the women on location to see how they interact during a public appearance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Katy Perry's choreographer, Nick Florez, stops by to offer some performance advice to the ladies. A day that each cheerleader never forgets. The first time they wear the DCC uniform to pose for their cameo photos.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The squad goes on an appearance to support pop music star, Demi Lovato. The ladies learn the entrance to the famed pre-game dance. It's a make or break moment. If a woman can't learn it quickly it might be her last night.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With two suspended vets, the team must re-block their formations for their Hall Of Fame performance. New vets step up as a new point of the triangle is named. The rookie candidates try to get their footing during this never seen before rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: 23 veterans travel to Canton, Ohio to perform at Jerry Jones' induction to the Pro Football Hall of Fame. All eyes are watching as the DCC perform for the NFL elite.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As training camp winds down the pressure skyrockets. No one wants to be sent home now. The ladies start to crack under the pressure. Another one is sent home. Will this be the final cut?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli announces the official squad and the women realize the hard-fought dream of becoming a Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader. Full of excitement and nerves, the squad prepares for their very first football game at AT&T Stadium.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of eager hopefuls -- ranging from starry-eyed rookies to experienced NFL cheerleaders -- gather at AT&T Stadium for a shot at joining the world's most famous squad.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic period saw the advent of the largest and strongest dinosaurs that ever roamed the Earth.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A look at the world as it was 149 million years ago - in the late Jurassic Period. The old continents have broken up and much of the land is under water. Huge shallow seas have supported a revolution in marine life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is the late Cretaceous period and Tyrannosaurus rex is the top predator, but the Earth is poisoned by volcanic activity and a comet strikes.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve tries to chomp through a car like a T-rex, wield an axe like an Allosaurus and hitch a ride in Britain's biggest tank to showcase the might of a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve gets freaky on a mission to find the weirdest dinosaur ever. He kick-starts with a Gigantoraptor, an 8 metre tall giant that laid the biggest eggs in history.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve discovers just what it takes to be a terror from the skies. He straps himself into one of Britain's fastest wind tunnels where he goes head to head against Microraptor.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve travels to new depths as he discovers just what it takes to be an aquatic terror. His quest sees him rocket through water in spectacular style, just like an Opthalmosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve's on a mission to find dinosaurs that have something a little special: fearsome killers, with incredible abilities! Get ready for a sensory sensation! His quest sees him race in the dark like a Troodon.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve goes on an undercover mission to unearth the sneakiest dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. So Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge, the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files, Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today, distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision, tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School, and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different from the all-girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team, Baby Lyssa decides she will step up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission--convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a runaway fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on, the lame Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder, Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows, only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Fallon gets a letter from Steven and it turns out he's on an oil rig in the Java Sea, Indonesia. Adam mixes the toxic compound in the paint for Jeff's new office. Fallon hires Kirby as a nanny for little Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Jeff starts to become dizzy and affected by the toxic paint Adam used in his office. Joseph tells Kirby to stay away from Jeff. Krystle goes to Acapulco to find out what really happened with the so-called divorce from Mark.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: The Carrington family is informed that Steven's oil rig exploded. Blake goes to look for him, with an uninvited Alexis. Sammy Jo's father returns to Denver to collect Sammy Jo's share of Steven's inheritance, but Krystle throws him out.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis and Blake continue the search for Steven in Indonesia but find evidence that Steven might be dead. Blake refuses to believe it, and hires a psychic, Jason Denner, to help. Jeff gets really ill from the paint in his office. Adam rapes Kirby.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Back in Denver, Blake continues his frantic search for Steven with the help of psychic Jason Dehner. Blake refuses to believe his son is dead, and Krystle is worried about his erratic behavior. Fallon mends fences with stepmother, Krystle.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: An obviously ill Jeff continues to function in a confused state. Sammy Jo announces she's headed for New York to make it big as a model and no longer wants to keep her son, Danny. Blake offers the girl $100,000 to be a mother to the child.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Jeff's temper continues to grow more volatile. Adam attempts to implicate Jeff in the Cecil Colby/Logan Rhinewood scandal. After learning that Blake and Krystle intend to adopt Steven's son Danny, Alexis demands custody of her grandson.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Although Blake begs her to postpone taking action until Jeff's violent behavior can be explained. Fallon flies to Haiti to obtain a divorce; Mark shows up unexpectedly at her hotel. Alexis tells Adam she cannot allow Jeff to be poisoned.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis is concerned the doctors will learn the truth behind Jeff's illness, but Adam tries to cover by ordering his office remodeled and the lethal paint compound removed. Mark and Fallon get closer in Haiti.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle suspects Alexis knows the reason for Jeff's illness; Blake tries to prevent Alexis' proposed merger; Jeff is released from the hospital and Kirby reveals her feelings for him.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: As Blake is departing for Singapore to identify his son, Alexis intercepts him at the airport to assure him she will not be stopped from merging their respective companies.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake persaudes Steven to return to Denver for his son's sake; the rest of the Carringtons are emotional, learning that Steven's alive and returning home; once home, Steven reunites with Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Upon hearing that Kirby has married Jeff, Joseph tells his daughter she has ruined her life. Blake suggests to Alexis they call a truce to their battle over Steven; Alexis offers Steven a share in Colbyco.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: As the Board of Directors gathers to vote on the Denver-Carrington/Colbyco merger, Alexis pointedly tells the group that a nay vote will be met with immediate dismissal. The approval of the motion sends Blake into a fury.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Explora la seguridad con Little Angel! Desde el patio de recreo hasta la los primeros auxilios, pasando por la hora de la siesta y el cuidado de la piel. Será un viaje lleno de diversión para mantenerte a salvo.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en un viaje lleno de diversión en el que aprenderás a compartir, lo que potenciará la empatía y el sentimiento de cuidado hacia los demás.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en el divertido viaje de aprender las lecciones más importantes de la vida.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Sumérgete en la diversión veraniega con Little Angel! Desde compartir en el parque hasta emocionantes visitas al parque acuático, nadar, bailar, acampar, días de playa y aventuras junto al lago, ¡es un verano lleno de alegría y risas!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Entra en un mundo de encanto y diversión eternos con Little Angel y las mejores canciones infantiles.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Bienvenido al mundo de los pequeños modales, donde los Little Angels enseñarán valiosas lecciones de amabilidad, empatía y buenos modales.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a la aventura de aprendizaje de Little Angel! Desde explorar profesiones hasta comprender los sentidos, la alimentación sana, la anatomía y las visitas al médico, ¡cada paso es un descubrimiento de conocimiento y diversión!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels y disfruta de grandes risas, lecciones y momentos conmovedores mientras crecen.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus divertidas aventuras. Desde paseos en camión hasta misterios con calcetines, zapatos apestosos, magia con helados, rugidos de dinosaurios, la hora de dormir y los superpoderes de mamá: ¡un día de diversión e imaginación!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en una emocionante aventura de aprendizaje y exploración. Desde descubrir sabores hasta dominar movimientos de karate, cada aventura está llena de risas, descubrimientos y valiosas lecciones que inspiran la curiosidad.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un viaje especial a través de un día lleno de exploración y aprendizaje. Desde ordenar la casa hasta recordar su infancia, cada momento trae nuevos descubrimientos.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels y aprende sobre sus amigos los animales en esta emocionante aventura que seguro les arrancará muchas sonrisas a los más pequeños.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Súbete a bordo de un viaje lleno de diversión y risas mientras Little Angel se adentra en una aventura.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus aventuras de juego. Desde la imitación hasta los sustos a la hora de dormir, lavarse las manos, la paciencia, la búsqueda de juguetes, las ovejas sucias y el alegre cucú, ¡es un día de risas y juegos!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus aventuras llenas de risas y lecciones de vida. Aprenden a tomar decisiones saludables y la alegría de ayudar.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Prepárate para acompañar a los Little Angels en un viaje de coraje y valentía, en el que aprenderán a enfrentarse a nuevos retos con una sonrisa y con confianza.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en las encantadoras melodías que inspiran dulces sueños y sonrisas.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race

programme.title: Food to Get You Laid

programme.title: Food to Get You Laid

programme.title: Food to Get You Laid

programme.title: Food to Get You Laid

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Joc confronts his ex Sina about her relationship with Rod. Moriah's married man is revealed. Joseline rekindles an old friendship. Stevie goes to great lengths to bring his family together. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Tommie's new business venture has people wondering if she's making good decisions. Joseline and Stevie face off in court. Dime reveals she and Joseline have reconciled. Waka plots to fix his marriage. Sierra confronts Moriah. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Tommie's wine tasting brings drama and a surprise guest. Scrappy holds Kirk to the fire on the paternity of baby Kannon. Karlie finds out some truths about Joc. Joseline prepares for the birth of Bonnie. Mimi confronts Melissa. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: Baby predators learn to hunt and some emerge from the womb ready to kill.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it's head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare; monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Steering clear of alphas, whose horns, claws and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out; examining killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A male brown hare throws punches at his beloved; admiring a sandhill crane dance battle; ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season; why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beach master; giant petrels earn the nickname "murderous garbagemen"; a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight, any time is the right time to fight; the mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Analyzing the shady methods that animal delinquents use to create fear and chaos.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Learning to fight dirty with a guanaco, head-butting a fellow iguana to claim a piece of prime territory, and meeting a hermit crab who forcibly evicts a tenant from its shell.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill - on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Serial Psyche
programme.desc: Some serial killers are driven by a hatred for humankind, while others seek revenge for their abusive childhoods; some simply love to kill; a look at a killer labeled America's most meticulous serial killer, Israel Keyes.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops; Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter; Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers; Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe's evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama; normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut; wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot but it's not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: Find out what it takes to be the leader of a wolf, deer, rhino, or lion pack.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meeting alphas who get by with a little help from their friends; the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins; ant colonies' unique scents; female geladas always get the last word; wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Celebrating small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons; admiring nutrias' stink bombs; honey badgers' needlelike choppers; black-tailed gulls' razor-sharp beaks; the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: Aquatic and terrestrial creatures engage in combat as they dispute borders between land and water; predators learn to hunt in different situations while prey must watch for attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism; it all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors; male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is familiar.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: A Carlitos le van a cortar el pelo por primera vez, pero él le tiene miedo a los cortes de cabello, por lo que los Rugrats y Chas deciden ayudarlo a superar su miedo. Angélica y Susie son enviadas al mismo campamento.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando el triciclo de Susie se pierde y Angélica aparece montando uno idéntico, Susie la acusa de ser una ladrona. Angélica juega al doctor y le dice a Carlitos que tiene una enfermedad que lo convertirá en un rinoceronte.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: El Abuelo comienza a sentir que es una molestia y se muda a una casa de retiro que parecía linda por televisión pero termina siendo aburrida. El Abuelo lleva a los Rugrats de campamento en el patio.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Después de ir al circo, Angélica prepara su propio circo con los Rugrats como los actores. Los Rugrats intentan encontrar un hermanito para Tommy en un huevo abandonado en un nido.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Angélica se pone una crema para la piel que cree que la hace invisible, para tratar de robar postres de la cocina. Después de una mala experiencia, Carlitos decide quedarse adentro de la casa porque Tommy juega muy torpemente.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Angélica es muy mala con los niños, y Tommy desea que algo malo le pase a ella. Angélica se queda en la casa de Tommy cuando sus padres se van de viaje, y hace de cuenta que se le rompió una pierna para que le presten atención.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Mientras están al cuidado de la hermana mayor de Susie, Tommy y su amiga sospechan que hay monstruos dentro de la casa. El Abuelo les cuenta a Angélica y a Tommy de lo mucho que se peleaban Hugo y Julio cuando eran niños.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando la película “Reptar 2010" se rompe, cada Rugrat cuenta su propio final de la historia, describiendo un Reptar que se parece a ellos mismo. Cuando uno de los inventos de Hugo no sale como debía, decide conseguir un trabajo.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Después de que Carlitos admira uno de los juguetes de Tommy, Tommy decide dárselo, pero luego se arrepiente. Los Rugrats encuentran una moneda en el parque y Angélica hace que los niños traten de encontrar más.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Mientras Hugo muestra unos videos caseros de sus vacaciones, los Rugrats deciden narrar sus propias historias sobre sus vidas. Hugo inventa un muñeco que habla para los niños, pero ellos lo encuentran aterrador.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando Angélica y Carlitos se quedan atados con unas esposas de juguete, tienen que encontrar la forma de separarse. Mientras nieva en el barrio de los Rugrats, los bebés se marchan hacia el patio para buscar el Polo Norte y a Santa.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los bebés se escapan al tráiler del Abuelo, confundiéndolo con una nave espacial. Angélica tiene miedo de cumplir años y tener más responsabilidades, entonces comienza a actuar como un bebé.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Angélica malinterpreta unos comentarios de sus padres y se piensa que es una verdadera princesa. Cuando Tommy se queda en la casa de Carlitos por algunos días, las mañas de cada uno les empiezan a molestar.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Tommy decide que le gustaría andar desnudo como su perro, Firulais. Angélica forma un club secreto y hace que los bebés compitan para entrar en el club.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando Chas reemplaza la cuna de Carlitos por una cama de nene grande, Angélica le dice a Carlitos que debajo de la cama hay un monstruo. Chas gana la lotería, por lo que él y Carlitos se vuelven millonarios.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlota lleva a Tommy y Angélica al trabajo. Ellos hacen un desastre y casi arruinan un contrato. Un ángel de la guarda, le muestra a Carlitos como hubiera sido la vida de su familia si él nunca hubiera nacido.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlitos tiene un sueño muy real, y los bebes intentan convencerlo de que no está soñando. Cansada de ser dejada de lado en la casa de Phil y Lil, Angelica dice que ella sabe quien de los mellizos es el favorito y cuál el olvidado.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlitos está cansado de que la gente bromee con su pelo colorado, y le pide a Tommy que se lo tiña negro con la tintura del Abuelo. Cuando Firulais se pierde, Hugo trata de reemplazarlo con una serie nueva de juguetes.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Angélica convence a los bebés de que Carlitos es un extraterrestre. Después de que Chas le habla a Carlitos sobre los gérmenes, Carlitos tiene temor de tocar cosas por miedo a tener contacto con gérmenes.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlota anuncia que está embarazada, y Angélica teme ser olvidada una vez que nazca el bebé. Los Rugrats se imaginan que son héroes para recuperar los muñecos de su programa de televisión favorito que Angélica les quitó.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cansados del maltrato de Angélica, los Rugrats van a jugar con otro niño en el parque llamado Josh, quien termina siendo peor que Angélica. Angélica decide denunciar a sus padres cuando ellos tratan de hacerle comer brócoli.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los Rugrats van a la casa de Boris y Minka para pasar las Pascuas y, por accidente, se quedan todos encerrados en el ático. Para pasar el tiempo, Boris les cuenta a los bebés la historia de Moisés.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando Hugo rompe el televisor, los Rugrats usan una caja vacía para crear sus propios programas. Angélica les dice a los bebés que el cielo se está cayendo y que está llegando el fin del mundo.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlitos adopta una mascota, el insecto Melville. Cuando Melville muere, a Carlitos le cuesta mucho aceptarlo y pasa por todos los procesos del duelo. Angélica les pide a los Rugrats que la mantengan alejada de las galletas.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Carlitos se enamora de una nueva niña, Megan, y demuestran su cariño molestándose. Los Rugrats están felices de que Angélica se va a mudar lejos, hasta que Tommy comienza a recordar el primer día que todos se conocieron.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: El comportamiento de Firulais se vuelve un poco extraño cuando adopta unos gatitos y los esconde en su casa. / Carlitos se contagia de varicela, y Angélica les dice a los bebés que es una enfermedad que te convierte en pollo.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Mientras escuchan un programa de radio con el Abuelo, los Rugrats juegan a ser detectives y se preponen resolver un misterio. / Angélica convence a los Rugrats de que puede predecir el futuro, y les pide juguetes y galletas como pago.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Hugo y Julio compiten entre sí grabando los momentos más divertidos de sus hijos para ganar un concurso de un programa de televisión. / Los Rugrats compiten en contra de los bebés McNulty para salvar la medalla de oro de Angélica.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy’s blood boils for revenge against the assassins who sabotaged Dorry and Broggy’s battle, but he’s currently trapped between a rock and a hard place.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: With an oversize collection of enormous steam engines, Gene's 17-acre North Carolina property is like an open-air museum where the guys start searching for smaller items they can actually move.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: As the guys are winding down their trip through the South, Danielle finds them the mother lode of rare motorbike parts in an old warehouse packed with new vintage Harley stock.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Determined to uncover a hidden honey hole, the guys are freestyling on their home turf in Iowa.

programme.title: American Pickers

programme.title: American Pickers

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In Florida, Mike and Frank visit a hangar-sized barn full of treasures, owned by a couple of junkyard junkies who've been picking since 1948. An awesome circus property turned animal preserve features lions, tigers, and bears.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time, THE AMAZING RACE features 11 new teams of all dating duos: six who are preexisting couples, and five duos who meet for the first time at the starting line.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Nagano, Japan where Racers take on an Olympic-sized Detour, and one team takes a tumble that may jeopardize their chances in the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tensions rise in Thailand as one team forgets their fanny pack, putting them behind, and one Racer celebrates the end of the leg when they pop a very special question.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams face a race within the Race when they attempt to navigate the chaotic streets of Bangkok, and Racers eat a traditional delicacy - a "1,000 year old egg."

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers strap on lederhosen for a trip to Oktoberfest in Bavaria, Germany, and one team finds their race in jeopardy after losing their fanny pack.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time, the Race travels to Monaco, where one team takes a big risk to gain an edge on the competition.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: When the race continues in Namibia, a flat tire deflates one team's hopes of leading the pack and the dreaded Double U-Turn returns.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the final five teams race to Amsterdam and take a dip in a floating hot tub in search of their next clue.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final five teams travel to Peru, where the Race gets physical and teams use their fitness trackers to help find their next clue. Also, Blair and Hayley's communication issues reach a boiling point.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: In the penultimate leg, the final four teams race through Peru for a spot in the finale and a chance at the $1 million prize.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Everything is bigger in Texas, including THE AMAZING RACE season finale! With the $1 million dollar prize on the line, the final four teams race from Peru to Dallas, where they go to great heights at the top of AT&T Stadium.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven new teams take off on the journey of a lifetime from Venice Beach, Calif. and head for Rio de Janeiro, where teams take a thrilling helicopter ride and face a huge decision at the Fast Forward.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Botany & Geology: Plants help provide oxygen and nutrients for existence. Soil is the fertilizer of life. Yet both can yield clues to the time and location of a person's death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson Investigation: Insurance torchings, mob burnouts and arson murders: these crimes are designed to take all clues with them. But a solid case can be built from a heap of ashes.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A killer may strike in the middle of the night, and hide clues well. But the police are always there, ready and working, and they will never give up when they're on the trail of criminals who decide it's Killing Time.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The forces of nature can reduce a body to bones in a matter of weeks. Using a unique combination of art and science, forensic anthropologists give victims a face long after they have been forgotten.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A teenager is abducted on a shopping trip. Two hikers disappear from the Appalachian Trail.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hairs and Fibers: The tiniest filament can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways. Investigators have come to rely on forensic evidence as fine as a carpet fiber or as innocent as an eyelash to crack difficult cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When lovers turn on each other, or marriages fail, some ruthless spouses find a grisly way to gain an uncontested divorce – with no paperwork. When murder tears lovers apart, forensic science must put piece together the mystery to catch the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In San Diego, California, a killer has left behind pieces of evidence. Detectives must sort through these small clues to prove murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas gets in trouble when he accuses the foreman of a neighboring ranch of rustling some of his cattle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Argentine family moves to North Fork. The townspeople are unfriendly to them, making fun of their clothing and customs. The Argentinean adult immigrant is openly hostile in return.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark find themselves exposed to anthrax after they adopt a stray horse whose owner has been killed in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After the end of the Civil War, General Phil Sheridan, who has been appointed Governor of the New Mexico Territory, is on an inspection tour of the country.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous gunfighter marries and decides to retire. He and his wife settle down in North Fork and open a store, but three outlaws arrive in town looking to best him in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas McCain's, a traveling photographer, comes to North Fork plying his trade. When a murder is committed, the photographer is accused of the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townsfolk of North Fork decide to give a young couple a shivaree celebration. When the drunken crowd gets out of hand and roughs up the bride-to-be, the young groom challenges them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a young boy from Brooklyn is accused of murder, Mark, believing the boy's claim of innocence, hides him until he can find the real killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart arrives in North Fork in search of renegade Indians suspected of the brutal killing of a Texas Ranger and his family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sid Fallon tries to blackmail former gambler Julia Andueza into allowing him to use her boarding house as a gambling hall and saloon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas puts his life in jeopardy when he agrees to testify in a murder case where the first witness was killed before he could testify, and the killer is still at large.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Outlaw Sam Morley falls in love with a young woman who has a serious illness and asks Lucas to turn him in for the reward and use the money to pay for her medical care.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas welcomes his old friend Tom Birch, who once saved his life, unaware that the man is now a bank robber on the run with his gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Dan Maury, released from Yuma prison, arrives in North Fork intent on getting even with Marshal Torrance, who helped send him to jail.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark McCain is eager to help lawman Jay Jefferson, who has arrived in North Fork intent on killing an outlaw for the reward, whether he is the right man or not.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas comes to the rescue when escaped convicts hold up the general store in North Fork and take Marshall Torrance hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark manages to capture a hawk but falls into danger with a rattlesnake. A stranger comes to his rescue and Mark invites the man home, unaware that he is on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas takes in an orphaned teen being raised by his abusive uncle after there is trouble at the school.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The McCains try to be tolerant of their embittered neighbor Abel MacDonald, but they decide he's gone too far when he won't allow his injured boy to get medical treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An unfounded rumor causes North Fork's outspoken feminist schoolteacher to be attacked by a mob of angry townspeople.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When his employer begins to suspect him of embezzlement, bookkeeper Asa Manning decides to hire a professional gunman to take care of the problem.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A drought has forced local cowhands to seek work on a railroad construction project, but executives are afraid workers will desert them if they believe an old man's claim of making rain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas McCain gives blood to save a dying man and is surprised by Marshall Torrance's odd behavior towards him. Soon, men arrive from a nearby town and demand custody of the man.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds of the body of a murder victim, Lucas, his friend Artemus and Marshall Torrance begin a search for the killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When renegade Apaches wound Lucas and kidnap Mark, Marshall Torrance joins with U.S. Marshall Sam Buckhart to form a rescue posse.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Isaac Dogboe 1

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Joet Gonzalez

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Marco Antonio Barrera II

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Marco Antonio Barrera III

programme.desc: On June 19th, 1992 Evander Holyfield battles Larry Holmes for the IBF, WBA, and WBC World Heavyweight title they battled at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas the bout went a full twelve rounds and ended in a unanimous decision win for Holyfield.

programme.title: Floyd Mayeather vs Jose Luis Castillo 2

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather Jr vs Justin Juuko

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Arturo Gatti

programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.desc: iSpy a Mean Teacher: Carly decides to do a webcast showing what mean teachers do when they're not in school. They decide to follow their mean teacher but find themselves in serious trouble when they accidentally get trapped at her apartment.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iWant a World Record: Carly, Sam, and Freddie try to break the world record for the longest continuous webcast. To do so, iCarly will have to run for over 24 hours straight.

programme.desc: iHeart Art: Carly invites Spencer's art hero, Harry Joyner, to take a look at Spencer's work. When Harry calls Spencer's work amateurish, Spencer feels like his life has lost its purpose.
